tooltip: Clear Heathland||All buildings are destroyed and the settlement is razed. This region is part of the ancient Heathland of a nearby Magical Forest. While razed, it will contribute to the Forest's health.
Raze||All buildings are destroyed and the settlement is torched. The previous owners will like you a lot less.
Raze||All buildings are destroyed and the settlement is torched.\n\nAlthough they are our enemies, we belong to the same race. To destroy their settlements would be villainy indeed!
Raze||All buildings are destroyed and the settlement is torched. \n\nPurging the land of evil is a great thing, both for Bretonnia and indeed the wider world.
